title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion euros, with a total of 16 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion euros has increased over the Year.

Revenue in billion euros is gradually increasing from 2003 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, roughly increasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Revenue in billion euros about 13.8 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Revenue in billion euros about 6.3 was recorded at Year 2003
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion euros, with a total of 16 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2018.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2003 to 2007.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
